DOC.brief_title: Comparison Clinical Outcomes After Cataract Surgery With Without Capsular Tension Ring
DOC.criteria: 1. age 40 79 year 2. history eye surgery glaucoma 3. transparent central cornea 4. pupil dilation preoperative examination least 6.0 mm 5. absence biomicroscopic sign pseudoexfoliation 6. normal fundus examination 1. presence ocular disease might affect visual outcome ( e.g. , color vision disturbance , chronic uveitis ) 2. presence ocular disease might affect contrast sensitivity function ( e.g. , glaucoma , maculopathy , high myopia )
